feed.title: Category: Life Force | MECHAkunEX Media Diary

entry.title: Game: Life Force (NES, 1987)
entry.content: I tried to play this shooter, but not only is it a poor version of Gradius, I've never been able to really get into Gradius. I hope to find a Gradius-style game that I am willing to put in the time for, but after going through the first level of this game, it was clear that it was not this.
